message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. I can do $130, but that's as low as I can go. It's a fair price, considering the product's value to you is $120.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $130. Would you be willing to meet me at $127.50?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I can do $128, but that's as low as I can go. It's a good price for both of us, considering the product's value to you is $120.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm really looking to get the best deal I can. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product. Would you be willing to accept that price?
